title: Will Annie and Zoe get a Star Guardian skin on the next batch?
body: This is my first and random discussion but i'm actually looking forward to see Star Guardian {{champion:1}}  and {{champion:142}} on the next batch ( if there is ), I'm just wondering how many people agree {{sticker:sg-jinx}}  and how many disagree {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
YOOOOOOO so technically this post should be over in Concepts & Creations, but I couldn't resist a star guardian post xD!

These two ARE PERFECT for Star Guardians right? Haven't heard anything official, but we can always hope!!
